title: Media Analyst
description:
MediaCore Strategies is Hiring a Media Analyst (Full-Time)

MediaCore Strategies, a São Paulo-based media agency, optimizes campaigns for clients in retail and tech. We’re seeking an Media Analyst to analyze campaign performance.

Role Summary
You’ll provide insights to enhance media strategies, working with teams to deliver results.

Key Tasks
- Analyze media data with Nielsen.
- Create performance reports.
- Collaborate for optimization.
- Conduct audience analysis.
- Support campaign planning.
- Perform market research.
- Stay updated on media trends.
- Prepare client presentations.
- Support budget planning.
- Contribute to team insights.

Qualifications
We need candidates with 2–3 years of experience in media analytics, proficient in Nielsen or Comscore. Strong analytical skills and campaign reporting experience are essential. A Bachelor’s degree in marketing or a related field is required.

Why MediaCore?
We value strategic thinking. Our hybrid work model offers flexibility, and we provide training and tools. You’ll work on diverse projects in a collaborative environment.

Perks
Health plan
Meal vouchers
20 days of annual leave
Training budget
Media tools access
Team events

Join Us
Apply now to join MediaCore Strategies and drive campaign success!
